name: Introduction to Programming
author: Dr. John Doe
description: This video provides an introduction to programming concepts, including variables, control structures, and basic data structures.

name: General Physics Study Guide
author: Prof. Jane Smith
description: A comprehensive study guide covering the key concepts of general physics, including mechanics, thermodynamics, and electromagnetism.

name: Art History Visuals
author: Dr. Emily Brown
description: A collection of images that depict important artworks from different periods in art history, ideal for visual reference and analysis.

description: This lecture delves into advanced topics in computer science, focusing on algorithms, data structures, and AI principles.

name: Calculus II Notes
author: Prof. Lisa White
description: Detailed notes covering the second part of calculus, including integrals, differential equations, and applications in machine learning.
